revised_title: Description and Observations of a Unique Insect Found in Kent
tldr: The author, Littleton Brown, describes an unusual insect found in a pond on Bexby Common in Kent. The insect has 42 legs, with 20 near the head and 22 smaller legs towards the tail. Its legs are adapted for swimming, and it resembles the Molucca Crab in some parts. Brown requests the insect's name and seeks more information about its description.
